title: Climate Guidance Series Observational Rainfall Data

outline.text: Common sources of observational rainfall data
Questions to answer with observational rainfall data
•	 How much rain fell in the past x days/weeks/months? Observational rainfall datasets
•	 Were there more rainy days this month than last month? Observational rainfall data is
•	 How many dry spells were there during the past rainy season? How long was the
•	 How often in the past decade were more than x millimeters of rainfall measured?

•	 Is a severe flooding event about to occur? Are we going through a severe drought?
